Title: Provides for the labeling of food or food products that contain a genetically engineered material or that are produced with a genetically engineered material
Summary: Provides for the labeling of food or food products that contain a genetically engineered material or that are produced with a genetically engineered material; defines terms; imposes penalties for false labels and misbranding; sets forth exemptions.
LawCode: Add §391-u, Gen Bus L; amd §§198 & 201, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the labeling of genetically engineered foods
